metadata.Title: CVE-2017-15275 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.Description:
Samba before 4.7.3 might allow remote attackers to obtain sensitiveinformation by leveraging failure of the server to clear allocated heapmemory.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2017-15275` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

ctdb - 2:4.3.11+dfsg-0ubuntu0.16.04.12
libnss-winbind - 2:4.3.11+dfsg-0ubuntu0.16.04.12
